original_title: Words First: After the After Party
overview: After a couple of drinks, a girl admits to her best friend that sheâ€™s always wanted to know what it feels like to be kissed by a girl. But how will they feel, and has their friendship been altered forever?  After the After Party is part of the Words First series of spoken word animations, commissioned to celebrate the finalists of the 2022 BBC Words First talent development scheme.
title: Words First: After the After Party
